name: BrowserAct Extracts Raw Webpage Text from Google Sheet Sites
description:
Automate raw webpage text extraction from Google Sheets-listed sites with this workflow. Stop manual text scraping and get AI-processed data updated back to Sheets automatically.
WHAT IT DOES:
Extracts raw webpage text from sites in Google Sheets via BrowserAct
Processes text using Make AI Toolkit (analysis, formatting, etc.)
Updates processed data back to Google Sheets rows
Runs automatically on Google Sheets triggers
HOW IT WORKS:
Google Sheets searches rows to trigger the workflow
BrowserAct runs a workflow to extract raw text from target webpages
Make AI Toolkit processes the text (parsing, analyzing, etc.)
Updates processed text to the corresponding Google Sheets row
REQUIREMENTS:
BrowserAct account with webpage text extraction workflows
Google Sheets for site URLs and data storage
Make AI Toolkit access for text processing
PERFECT FOR:
Content researchers, data analysts, and teams needing automated web text extraction and AI processing from Google Sheets.
TIME SAVED: 100-200 hours/year
SETUP TIME: 30-45 mins
Streamline web text extraction and AI processing with this automated Google Sheets-BrowserAct workflow!
